channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Up 2
channel.desc: Hosts Piri Weepu and Matua Parkinson travel around Aotearoa to see what some of our sporting heroes have been up too. Mutts yarns with olympian and ex Football Fern Kristy Hill. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Whakaata M?ori
channel.desc: Whakaata M?ori specialises in the stories of Aotearoa. Be entertained and informed with news, current affairs, sports, drama, documentaries and much more.

channel.title: Cocomelon

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Tales From Zambia
channel.desc: Explore Zambia's diverse wildlife, from majestic elephants to playful baboons, through this captivating collection. Venture into breathtaking habitats and witness fascinating animal behaviours.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Moon Tide Fishing Grass Roots
channel.desc: Nore and his cuzzy M?tene are fishing in the far north waters of Te Hiku o Te Ika during the Tangaroa Kiokio maramataka phase - a time of surging energy. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: H?iho Riding On
channel.desc: Lizzie Rangihuna is back to explore the nations back country and reveal the great stories from the paddock, meeting the people making a difference in their communities through their Hoiho. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Hunt With Me
channel.desc: The??Brothers of Tangaroa are out diving on the rugged coast of Wellington,??while??Hemi is hunting for a deer in Kaikoura. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Piri's Tiki Tour
channel.desc: All Black hero Piri Weepu combines his love for Rugby with his skill at diving and hunting around Aotearoa meeting up with locals. (R).

channel.title: Marae

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: M? Te Atea
channel.desc: A lament to the many taiohi who have responded to the call of Hine-nui-i-te-p?. Te Wairere Ngaia and her ?konga explain the lessons learnt during a challenging period of loss for their kura. (R).

channel.desc: NEW: Up-and-coming pop singer Thea May (Anishinaabe) draws strength and inspiration from the beauty of her community and family after a devastating personal loss. Directed by Darlene Naponse.

channel.title: Don't Even
channel.desc: NEW: Uncle Sizzle?s employee of the month, Harley, is celebrated at a staff party where Mickey is unusually supportive. Meanwhile, Violet and Showboat go all out to get into the battle of the bands.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Kair?kau
channel.desc: Te Purewa declares war while Ruamahu??is consumed by revenge. Te Huru's loyalty is questioned and Tionga is lured into a trap. (R).

channel.title: Ahik?roa
channel.desc: Chantelle breaks tikanga to protect the youth boys and Whatukura faces his biggest challenge yet. (R).

channel.title: Sort Of

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Breaking Silence
channel.desc: Simonne Butler shares critical insights into the relationship that changed her life forever. A relationship where she nearly lost her life at the hands of another. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Breaking Silence
channel.desc: NZ Police Detective Jaimie-Leigh shares her story of trauma to inspire that one?s past need not define their future, and dreams can come true. (R).
